text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Jordanian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Emir of Bahrain praises Jordanian role and promises visit soon to Amman; Prime Minister Majali expresses satisfaction with his Manama visit.
- Jordan to discuss with Egypt building gas pipeline across Sinai to Jordan's Aqaba port to supply kingdom with Egyptian gas.
- Higher Egyptian-Jordanian committee headed by prime ministers of the two countries to meet in Cairo on Saturday to discuss increasing political and economic cooperation.
- King Hussein may visit Riyadh soon; possible Syrian-Saudi-Egyptian summit in Jeddah this month, according to Saudi sources.
